description.value:
Hundreds of magically hidden pockets on this cloak allow you to keep a wealth of items close at hand.

Neck Slot: Rare

Enhancement Bonus: Fortitude, Reflex, and Will

Properties:

  • The pockets of this cloak can hold up to 1,000 pounds in weight or 100 cubic feet in volume, but the cloak always weighs only 1 pound. Each item stored within one of the cloak's pockets can weigh no more than 10 pounds. Drawing an item from a deep-pocket cloak is a minor action.
  • You gain an item bonus to Bluff checks and Stealth checks equal to the cloak's enhancement bonus.

Power (Free Action)

Once per round, you can draw an item from the cloak or store an item within it as a free action.
